name: Robert SCULLION and Janet Scullion, his wife, Appellants, v. ST. FRANCIS GENERAL HOSPITAL, a corporation, and J.W. Loftis, M.D.
name_abbreviation: Scullion v. St. Francis General Hospital

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: Robert SCULLION and Janet Scullion, his wife, Appellants, v. ST. FRANCIS GENERAL HOSPITAL, a corporation, and J.W. Loftis, M.D.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Ellen M. Viakley, Berger Kapetan Malakoff & Meyers, P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellants.
Gary M. Lang, Feldstein, Grinberg, Stein & McKee, Pittsburgh, for Pennsylvania Trial Lawyers Ass’n.
John W. Jordan, IV, Grigsby, Gaea & Davies, P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
522 A.2d 1103
Robert SCULLION and Janet Scullion, his wife, Appellants, v. ST. FRANCIS GENERAL HOSPITAL, a corporation, and J.W. Loftis, M.D.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 11, 1987.
Decided March 23, 1987.
Ellen M. Viakley, Berger Kapetan Malakoff & Meyers, P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellants.
Gary M. Lang, Feldstein, Grinberg, Stein & McKee, Pittsburgh, for Pennsylvania Trial Lawyers Ass’n.
John W. Jordan, IV, Grigsby, Gaea & Davies, P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellees.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
